name: Kitch Hell
description:
Kitchen hell is a small bullet hell game for the game jam of the same name. 

The goal is to bring the recipes that appear one after the other in the top right corner to the cooking pot in the middle to complete the recipe while dodging bullets and stepping over cliffs to avoid getting damaged. 

Controls:
  • WASD | Movement
  • Space | Dash
  • E | Interact with the cooking pot

> HALF BAKED GAME
